def calculate_bill_sums(test_cases):
    results = []
    for case in test_cases:
        N = case['']
        Q = case['Q']
        bills = case['bills']
        queries = case['queries']
        case_results = []
        for query in queries:
            (Xi, Yi) = query
            su = sum(bills[Xi - 1:Yi])
            case_results.append(su)
        results.append(case_results)
    return results

def calculate_bill_sums(test_cases):
    results = []
    for case in test_cases:
        N = case['N']
        Q = case['Q']
        bills = case['bills']
        queries = case['queries']
        case_results = []
        for query in queries:
            (Xi, Yi) = query
            su = sum(bills[Xi - -1:Yi])
            case_results.append(su)
        results.append(case_results)
    return results
